name: Particular Puzzles
description:
Particular Puzzles is my entry for the 2019 GMTK Jam! The theme is "only one."

In this game, players must complete each puzzle with only one move! Complete as many puzzles as you can within only one minute!

Quick Reference:

  • When activated, Arrows activate the tile in the direction they face and then rotate clockwise 90 degrees
  • When activated, Conduits activate the next tile in the same direction
  • When activated, Prisms activate the tile to their right (from the point of view of the activating tile)

I hope you enjoy, and post your high score! The highest I've gotten is 32 :)

I wrote all the code, drew all the art, wrote all the music, and came up with the design on my own for this game. The royalty-free sound clips I found online.
